Control Name: Protects Removal Media—Encryption technologies and physical asset protections are used for removable media (such as USB drives and back-up tapes), as appropriate.

control_attributes.Control: Protects Removal Media—Encryption technologies and physical asset protections are used for removable media (such as USB drives and back-up tapes), as appropriate.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.7 The entity restricts the transmission, movement, and removal of information to authorized internal and external users and processes, and protects it during transmission, movement, or removal to meet the entity’s objectives.
